name: FIGHTING EX LAYER (Light Version)
description:
*In addition to this product, there is also [FIGHTING EX LAYER Standard Version]. Please confirm the version before purchasing.

To enjoy Online Multiplayer, you must be a member of PlayStation®Plus.

Contents
- [FIGHTING EX LAYER] Game

Description
ARIKA's classic EX characters come together once again for another intense battle!

Featuring the new [Gougi] system that redefines the basics of Fighting Games!
Fulfill certain requirements during battle to unlock your Gougi. Your characters will awaken new powers and you can take control of the battle.
We have plans to introduce new Gougi and Characters as downloadable content in the future!

It is possible to play 1v1 battles both Offline and Online.

Content bought on the PlayStation™Store can be registered to a single Sony Entertainment Network account and played on multiple devices, but we make no guarantee that this is always the case. For details, please check the newest 'About the Store' information.
